title: Angkor Wat
content: Angkor Wat is the largest religious monument in the world, located in Siem Reap, Cambodia. It was built in the 12th century by King Suryavarman II.

title: Pub Street
content: Pub Street is the main nightlife area in Siem Reap, full of restaurants, bars, and night markets.

title: Bayon Temple
content: Bayon Temple is famous for its stone faces and is located in the center of Angkor Thom.
